title: Russian Forces Closer to Taking Mariupol as They Expand Eastern Ukraine Footprint - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Russian Forces Closer to Taking Mariupol as They Expand Eastern Ukraine Footprint  The Wall Street Journal
  2. WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT - Russia presses offensive in ruins of Mariupol  Reuters
  3. Ukrainian governor says city of Mariupol ‘wiped off the face of the earth’  The Hill
  4. After More Than a Month of Fighting, Much of Mariupol Lies in Ruins  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Battle for Mariupol continues  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Russian Defense Ministry said the urban areas of the besieged port city had been cleared of Ukrainian troops, with local military resistance isolated at a metallurgical plant in an industrial area.
